file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 2019Q2
  title: Cancer Dependency Map API
  description: This site provides an API access to [Cancer Dependency Map (DepMap)
    data](https://depmap.org/portal/download/). The goal of the Cancer
    Dependency Map is to create a comprehensive preclinical reference map
    connecting  tumor features with tumor dependencies to accelerate the
    development of precision treatments.  By integrating data beyond those
    collected at the Broad, DepMap hopes to develop a complete  understanding of
    the vulnerabilities of cancer, identify targets for therapeutic
    development,  and design strategies to optimize patient responses to those
    therapies. By using this site, you agree to DepMap's [Terms and
    Conditions](https://depmap.org/portal/terms/).
  termsOfService: https://depmap.org/portal/terms/
  contact:
    name: Broad NCATS translator
    email: translator@broadinstitute.org
paths:
  /genes:
    get:
      tags:
        - types
      summary: Retrieve list of genes
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/gene"
  /cell_lines:
    get:
      tags:
        - types
      summary: Retrieve list of cell lines
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/cell_line"
  /proteins:
    get:
      tags:
        - types
      summary: Retrieve list of protein antibodies
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/protein"
  "/gene_expression/by_gene/{ensembl_gene}":
    get:
      tags:
        - values
      summary: Retrieve gene expression by gene
      parameters:
        - name: ensembl_gene
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/expression_value"
  "/gene_expression/by_cell_line/{depmap_id}":
    get:
      tags:
        - values
      summary: Retrieve gene expression by cell line
      parameters:
        - name: depmap_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/expression_value"
  "/gene_dependency/by_gene/{entrez_gene_id}":
    get:
      tags:
        - values
      summary: Retrieve gene dependency by gene
      parameters:
        - name: entrez_gene_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/dependency_value"
  "/gene_dependency/by_cell_line/{depmap_id}":
    get:
      tags:
        - values
      summary: Retrieve gene dependency by cell line
      parameters:
        - name: depmap_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/dependency_value"
  "/copy_number/by_gene/{entrez_gene_id}":
    get:
      tags:
        - values
      summary: Retrieve copy-number values by gene
      parameters:
        - name: entrez_gene_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/copy_number_value"
  "/copy_number/by_cell_line/{depmap_id}":
    get:
      tags:
        - values
      summary: Retrieve copy-number values by cell line
      parameters:
        - name: depmap_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/copy_number_value"
  "/rnai/by_gene/{entrez_gene_id}":
    get:
      tags:
        - values
      summary: Retrieve rnai values by gene
      parameters:
        - name: entrez_gene_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/rnai_value"
  "/rnai/by_cell_line/{depmap_id}":
    get:
      tags:
        - values
      summary: Retrieve rnai values by cell line
      parameters:
        - name: depmap_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/rnai_value"
  "/mutations/by_gene/{entrez_gene_id}":
    get:
      tags:
        - values
      summary: Retrieve mutations by gene
      parameters:
        - name: entrez_gene_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/mutation"
  "/mutations/by_cell_line/{depmap_id}":
    get:
      tags:
        - values
      summary: Retrieve mutations by cell line
      parameters:
        - name: depmap_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/mutation"
  "/protein_array/by_protein/{antibody_name}":
    get:
      tags:
        - values
      summary: Retrieve protein array values by gene
      parameters:
        - name: antibody_name
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/protein_array_value"
  "/protein_array/by_cell_line/{depmap_id}":
    get:
      tags:
        - values
      summary: Retrieve protein array values by cell line
      parameters:
        - name: depmap_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/protein_array_value"
servers:
  - url: http://indigo.ncats.io/depmap
components:
  schemas:
    gene:
      type: object
      properties:
        hgnc_id:
          type: string
        gene_symbol:
          type: string
        ensembl_gene:
          type: string
        entrez_gene_id:
          type: integer
        omim:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
    cell_line:
      type: object
      properties:
        depmap_id:
          type: string
        stripped_cell_line_name:
          type: string
        ccle_name:
          type: string
        aliases:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        cosmic_id:
          type: string
        sanger_id:
          type: string
        disease:
          type: string
        disease_subtype:
          type: string
        disease_sub_subtype:
          type: string
        gender:
          type: string
        source:
          type: string
    protein:
      type: object
      properties:
        antibody_name:
          type: string
        target_genes:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        validation_status:
          type: string
        company:
          type: string
        catalog_number:
          type: string
    expression_value:
      type: object
      properties:
        ensembl_gene:
          type: string
        depmap_id:
          type: string
        value:
          type: number
    dependency_value:
      type: object
      properties:
        entrez_gene_id:
          type: integer
        depmap_id:
          type: string
        value:
          type: number
    copy_number_value:
      type: object
      properties:
        entrez_gene_id:
          type: integer
        depmap_id:
          type: string
        value:
          type: number
    rnai_value:
      type: object
      properties:
        entrez_gene_ids:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
        depmap_id:
          type: string
        value:
          type: number
    protein_array_value:
      type: object
      properties:
        protein:
          type: object
          properties:
            antibody_name:
              type: string
            target_genes:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
        depmap_id:
          type: string
        value:
          type: number
    mutation:
      type: object
      properties:
        entrez_gene_id:
          type: integer
        gene_symbol:
          type: string
        depmap_id:
          type: string
        ncbi_build:
          type: integer
        chromosome:
          type: string
        start_position:
          type: integer
        end_position:
          type: integer
        strand:
          type: string
        variant_classification:
          type: string
        variant_type:
          type: string
        reference_allele:
          type: string
        tumor_seq_allele:
          type: string
        dbsnp_rs:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        dbsnp_val_status:
          type: string
        genome_change:
          type: string
        annotation_transcript:
          type: string
        cdna_change:
          type: string
        codon_change:
          type: string
        protein_change:
          type: string
        is_deleterious:
          type: string
        tcga_hotspot_count:
          type: string
        cosmic_hotspot_count:
          type: string
        exac_af:
          type: string
        cga_wes_ac:
          type: string
        sanger_wes_ac:
          type: string
        sanger_recalibwes_ac:
          type: string
        rnaseq_ac:
          type: string
        hc_ac:
          type: string
        rd_ac:
          type: string
        wgs_ac:
          type: string
        variant_annotation:
          type: string
